		TEXTILE_COMP_IND as string,
		SGT_CSGR as string,
		SGT_COVSA as string,
		SGT_STAT as string,

		SGT_REL as string,

		FSH_MG_AT1 as string,
		FSH_MG_AT2 as string,
		FSH_MG_AT3 as string,
		FSH_SEALV as string,
		FSH_SEAIM as string,
		FSH_SC_MID as string,
		DUMMY_PRD_INCL_EEW_PS as string,
		SCM_MATID_GUID16 as binary,
		SCM_MATID_GUID22 as string,
		SCM_MATURITY_DUR as decimal(38,18),
		SCM_SHLF_LFE_REQ_MIN as decimal(38,18),
		SCM_SHLF_LFE_REQ_MAX as decimal(38,18),
		SCM_PUOM as string,
		{/CWM/XCWMAT} as string,
		{/CWM/VALUM} as string,

		{/SAPMP/AHO} as string,

		{/VSO/R_TILT_IND} as string,
		{/VSO/R_STACK_IND} as string,
		{/VSO/R_BOT_IND} as string,
		{/VSO/R_TOP_IND} as string,
		{/VSO/R_STACK_NO} as string,
		{/VSO/R_PAL_IND} as string,
		{/VSO/R_PAL_OVR_D} as decimal(38,18),
		{/VSO/R_PAL_OVR_W} as decimal(38,18),
		{/VSO/R_PAL_B_HT} as decimal(38,18),
		{/VSO/R_PAL_MIN_H} as decimal(38,18),
		{/VSO/R_TOL_B_HT} as decimal(38,18),
		{/VSO/R_NO_P_GVH} as string,
		{/VSO/R_QUAN_UNIT} as string,
		{/VSO/R_KZGVH_IND} as string,
		PACKCODE as string,
		DG_PACK_STATUS as string,
		MCOND as string,
		RETDELC as string,
		LOGLEV_RETO as string,
		NSNID as string,
		OVLPN as string,
		ADSPC_SPC as string,
		VARID as binary,
		MSBOOKPARTNO as string,
		VTYPE as string,
		EVVAL as string,
		DVERS as string,
		DPCBT as string,
		XGRDT as string,
		IMATN as string,
		PICNUM as string,
		BSTAT as string,
		COLOR_ATINN as string,
		SIZE1_ATINN as string,
		SIZE2_ATINN as string,
		COLOR as string,
		SIZE1 as string,
		SIZE2 as string,
		FREE_CHAR as string,
		CARE_CODE as string,
		BRAND_ID as string,
		FIBER_CODE1 as string,
		FIBER_PART1 as string,
		FIBER_CODE2 as string,
		FIBER_PART2 as string,
		FIBER_CODE3 as string,
		FIBER_PART3 as string,
		FIBER_CODE4 as string,
		FIBER_PART4 as string,
		FIBER_CODE5 as string,
		FIBER_PART5 as string,
		FASHGRD as string,
		CREATED_ON as timestamp,
		SOURCE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM STAGE.MARA',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceStageMARA
source(output(
		MANDT as string,
		MTART as string,
		MTREF as string,
		MBREF as string,
		FLREF as string,
		NUMKI as string,
		NUMKE as string,
		ENVOP as string,
		BSEXT as string,
		BSINT as string,
		PSTAT as string,
		KKREF as string,
		VPRSV as string,
		KZVPR as string,
		VMTPO as string,
		EKALR as string,
		KZGRP as string,
		KZKFG as string,
		BEGRU as string,
		KZPRC as string,
		KZPIP as string,
		PRDRU as string,
		ARANZ as string,
		WMAKG as string,
		IZUST as string,
		ARDEL as string,
		KZMPN as string,
		MSTAE as string,
		CCHIS as string,
		CTYPE as string,
		CLASS as string,
		CHNEU as string,
		PROD_TYPE_CODE as string,
		CONCTD_MATNR as string,
		VTYPE as string,
		VNUMKI as string,
		VNUMKE as string,
		KZFFF as string,
		KZRAC as string,
		CREATED_ON as timestamp,
		SOURCE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM STAGE.T134',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceStageT134
source(output(
		MANDT as string,
		SPRAS as string,
		MTART as string,
		MTBEZ as string,
		CREATED_ON as timestamp,
		SOURCE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM STAGE.T134T\n',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceStageT134T
source(output(
		MANDT as string,
		MATNR as string,
		SPRAS as string,
		MAKTX as string,
		MAKTG as string,
		CREATED_ON as timestamp,
		SOURCE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM STAGE.MAKT\n\nWHERE SPRAS COLLATE Latin1_General_CS_AS = \'D\' COLLATE Latin1_General_CS_ASâ€‹',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceStageMAKT
sourceStageMARA select(mapColumn(
		MANDT,
		MATNR,
		MTART,
		CREATED_ON,
		SOURCE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColMARA
sourceStageT134 select(mapColumn(
		MANDT,
		MTART,
		MTREF,
		CREATED_ON,
		SOURCE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColT134
sourceStageT134T select(mapColumn(
		MANDT,
		SPRAS,
		MTART,
		MTBEZ,
		CREATED_ON,
		SOURCE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColT134T
sourceStageMAKT select(mapColumn(
		MANDT,
		MATNR,
		SPRAS,
		MAKTX,
		CREATED_ON,
		SOURCE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColMAKT
SelectColMARA derive(MANDT = toInteger(MANDT)) ~> ChangeDatatypeMARA
SelectColT134 derive(MANDT = toInteger(MANDT)) ~> ChangeDatatypeT134
SelectColT134T derive(MANDT = toInteger(MANDT)) ~> ChangeDatatypeT134T
SelectColMAKT derive(MANDT = toInteger(MANDT)) ~> ChangeDatatypeMAKT
FilterT134T, ChangeDatatypeT134 join(ChangeDatatypeT134T@MANDT == ChangeDatatypeT134@MANDT
	&& SelectColT134T@MTART == SelectColT134@MTART,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinT134TT134
JoinT134TT134, JoinMAKTMARA join(ChangeDatatypeT134@MANDT == ChangeDatatypeMARA@MANDT
	&& SelectColT134@MTART == SelectColMARA@MTART,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinALL
FilterMAKT, ChangeDatatypeMARA join(ChangeDatatypeMAKT@MANDT == ChangeDatatypeMARA@MANDT
	&& SelectColMAKT@MATNR == SelectColMARA@MATNR,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMAKTMARA
JoinALL derive(HASHKEY_BK = md5('_',ChangeDatatypeMARA@MANDT,'_',SelectColMARA@MATNR,'_',SelectColMARA@MTART,'_',SelectColMAKT@SPRAS,'_'),
		HASHKEY_DATA = md5('_',MTREF,'_',MTBEZ,'_',MAKTX,'_'),
		CREATED_ON = currentTimestamp(),
		SOURCE = 'asapSql.STAGE.MARA_asapSql.STAGE.MAKT_asapSql.STAGE.T134T_asapSql.STAGE.T134') ~> CreateHash
ChangeDatatypeT134T filter({SPRAS} == 'D') ~> FilterT134T
ChangeDatatypeMAKT filter({SPRAS} == 'D') ~> FilterMAKT
CreateHash select(mapColumn(
		MANDT = {ChangeDatatypeMARA@MANDT},
		MATNR = {SelectColMARA@MATNR},
		MTART = {SelectColMARA@MTART},
		SPRAS = {SelectColMAKT@SPRAS},
		MTBEZ,
		MTREF,
		MAKTX,
		HASHKEY_BK,
		HASHKEY_DATA,
		CREATED_ON,
		SOURCE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnOrder
SelectColumnOrder aggregate(groupBy(MATNR,
		MANDT,
		MTART),
	each(match(name!='MANDT'&&name!='MATNR'&&name!='MTART'), $$ = first($$))) ~> distinctRows
distinctRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE CLEANSE.MATERIAL'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkMaterial
